text: Theresa Fu (born 22 September 1984) is a Hong Kong Cantopop singer, film and television actress, and model. Fu was introduced by the Talent Bang model agency in order to become a pop star. She started her career in 2002 as one of the members of Cookies. The group disbanded in 2005. In 2005, she recorded a duet, "自欺欺人", with Alex Fong. In 2006, she published a book with her personal drawings, stories and views on love. She is also good friends with her ex- bandmate, Stephy Tang. In 2008, Fu performed at the S.U.C.C.E.S.S. charity gala in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, with many other artists. On 30 May 2008, Fu appeared as a special guest on Leo Ku's The Magic Moments Concert in Toronto to a crowd of 10,000 people at Rogers Centre. ==Discography== ===Cookies=== {| class="wikitable" !align="left" width="250px"|Album information |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|Happy Birthday *Released: April 2002 *Label: EMI Hong Kong |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|Merry Christmas *Release date: December 23, 2002 *Label: EMI Hong Kong |} ===Mini Cookies=== Eclipse at Lan Kwai Fong, in Central, Hong Kong, 2009 Times Square in Hong Kong, 2008 {| class="wikitable" !align="left" width="250px"|Album information |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|All The Best *Released: August 13, 2003 *Label: EMI Hong Kong |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|4 Play *Release date: January, 2004 *Label: EMI Hong Kong |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|4 in Love *Release date: December 17, 2004 *Label: EMI Hong Kong |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|903 California Red: Eleven Fires Concert(11團火音樂會) *Release date: October, 2004 *Label: EMI Hong Kong |} ===Solo=== {| class="wikitable" !align="left" width="250px"|Album information |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|My Cup of T (EP) *Released: July 27, 2007 *Label: Gold Label Records |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|Smiling *Release date: July 23, 2008 *Label: Gold Label Records |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|Dearest (EP) *Release date: February 13, 2009 *Label: Gold Label Records |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|Metamorphosis (EP) *Release date: December 17, 2010 *Label: Filmko Entertainment Limited |} ===Appearances in other albums=== {| class="wikitable" !align="left" width="250px"|Album information !align="left"|Tracks contributed |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"|Be Good *Artist: Alex Fong *Released: 2005 *Label: EMI |align="left"|2.
